name: Suzuhara's I Wanna Be The Shark! Mobile test
name_original: Suzuhara's I Wanna Be The Shark! Mobile test
description:
"Hi. I am shark... I am hungry!!!"

Thank you for playing this game.

This game is an unofficial fan-made game of Suzuhara Lulu, a former Nijisanji's virtual liver.

Feel free to contact me for any problems @ https://twitter.com/CHCH18181

--------------------------------------------

=== Credits ===

Production : CH

BGM : 魔王魂

SFX : SubspaceAudio @ opengameart.org

--------------------------------------------

=== Gameplay ===

Press Virtual keys at the corners or Keyboard to control. 

Press "confirm" on the bottom right or “space” on keyboard to jump in-game.

Menu: up/down arrow

Confirm: space

Cancel/open menu: ESC

Jump: space
